name: C.R.E.A.M. Finance
description: C.R.E.A.M. Finance is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals, institutions and protocols to access financial services. Part of the yearn.finance ecosystem, it is a permissionless, open source and blockchain agnostic protocol serving users on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain and Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on C.R.E.A.M. to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account.

en.name: C.R.E.A.M. Finance
en.description: C.R.E.A.M. Finance is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals, institutions and protocols to access financial services. Part of the yearn.finance ecosystem, it is a permissionless, open source and blockchain agnostic protocol serving users on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain and Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on C.R.E.A.M. to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account.

fr.name: C.R.E.A.M. Finance
fr.description: C.R.E.A.M. Finance est un protocole de prêt décentralisé pour les particuliers, les institutions et les protocoles afin d'accèder aux services financiers. Faisant partie de l'écosystème yearn.finance, il s'agit d'un protocole agnostique sans autorisation, open source et blockchain qui aide les utilisateurs sur Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain et Fantom. Les utilisateurs peuvent déposer leurs avoirs sur C.R.E.A.M. pour générer du rendement, de la même façon qu' un compte d'épargne traditionnel.
